channel.title: Help
channel.description:
When I added my control panel, it compiled fine, but when I run the runserver.bat, instead of:
[code]Server Name Here is online! Server listening on port blah blah blah : 43594[/code]
It says:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:65)
[/code]

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

I did that on purpose…

Here’s pretty much what it would be.

Project Insanity is online! Server listening on port 43594:43594

Or something. Instead of that, it says this.

[code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365)
at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:33)
at server.Server.(Server.java:65)

[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:

try to remove the blah blah blah
